thread.section_title: Holiday inn Express London - Vauxhall Nine Elms - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pay for coffee, get a free smartphone
thread.title_full: Pay for coffee, get a free smartphone - Review of Holiday inn Express London - Vauxhall Nine Elms, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ABusinessPerson
title: Pay for coffee, get a free smartphone
text:
location, room, breakfast, noting special but we'll worth the money. the fact that they lend you a smartphone to use for free is however unexpected and awesome!
the only thing is that they don't have complementary coffee outside of breakfast hours..
